# Course Certificates

## Lakehouse Architecture with Databricks

<!--See https://customer-academy.databricks.com/learn/mycourses to view the course-->

* Course ID: E-VP9791
* Completed 5/5/2025


::: {#fig-lakehouse height=60%}
![](../outputs/databricks_certificate.png)

Certificate of Completion: Get Started With Lakehouse Architecture
:::


<details>
<summary>Course Topics and Objectives</summary>

* See the course [here](https://www.databricks.com/learn/training/get-started-lakehouse-architecture#data-video){target="_blank"}
* Learning Objectives:

> Describe the available compute options for workloads performed on the databricks data intelligence platform

> List the products and features databricks offers for different data-centric needs within the databricks platform

> Navigate the databricks workspace UI

> Develop an agreed upon set of terminology and concepts for discussing Lakehouse Architecture

> Define the framework of a modern data and AI platform

> Explain the range of functions, capabilities, and use cases for data lakehouses within enterprise businesses.

> Describe the rules that make up the guiding philosophy behind a data lakehouse architecture

> Use the guiding princples of the lakehouse architecture to verify that your organizations data strategy aligns with the vision of the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform.

> Identify the componenets of a lakehouse architecture by reviewing available reference architecture for your given cloud implementation.

> Differentiate between the different roles and responsibilities of Databricks Data Intelligence platform features and products and those provided by the cloud service provider in a lakehouse architecture.

> Describe the well-architected framework adopted by the three largest cloud service providers.

> Explain how Databricks has adapted and built upon the cloud well-architected framework for the well-architected lakehouse framework.

> List the seven pillars of the well-architected lakehouse framework.

</details>
